name: Notion Library
description: Track reading progress, book wishes, and book summaries in NotionNotion Library is made to help you keep track of books, book wishes, and book summaries all in one place, digitally.How does it work? Duplicate the template into your own Notion Add your books and categorize them Set a queue and track reading progress Collect books you want in the wishlist Add summaries after finishing books Price: Pay what you want (enter $0 to take it for free!)If you have any questions or queries, please email m
features: Duplicate the template into your own Notion; Add your books and categorize them; Set a queue and track reading progress; Collect books you want in the wishlist; Add summaries after finishing books
